title: Butterfly Kids Personalized Note Cards - 24 Cards with White Envelopes, 4¼ x 5½ Inch Size, Blank Stationery, Add Names or Text, For Thank You Notes, Invitations, & Announcements
features: GET PERSONAL WITH OUR NOTE CARDS: Our whimsical Butterfly Kids folded stationery can be personalized with your name or a unique message, and is a special way to show your appreciation and keep in contact with family and friends
BLANK INSIDE: Each greeting card sheet is printed on high-quality paper card stock, and is blank inside so you can write your own message - so go ahead and get creative with your bulk note set!
ADD YOUR INITIALS OR NAME: Simply specify a name or a unique message with up to 18 characters of text and spaces (please note that we are unable to print foreign characters in personalization)

MAKES A GREAT GIFT: Our custom notecards measure 4 ¼ x 5 ½ inches, and come ready to give in cello wrap with a gold seal making them great for announcements, congratulations, invitations, or as thank yous for birthday, holiday, or graduation gifts
100% MONEY BACK GUARANTEE: If you are not completely satisfied with your purchase, you may return it for a refund or replacement within 60 days of the shipping date
description: *** Get personal with our custom note card set! ***Our personalized Butterfly Kids notecard sets are the perfect way to express gratitude to your friends and family and come in handy for nearly any occasion. They feature a pastel butterfly-themed scene on the outside and are blank on the inside, which makes them ideal for multiple uses, including thank you cards or invitations to birthday or holiday parties, graduations, baby showers, and other noteworthy events. You have the option to specify a name or unique message with up to 18 characters and spaces (please note that we are unable to print foreign characters in personalization). This set comes wrapped in cellophane with a gold seal making it a festive way to honor any special occasion or celebration.*** A true value set ***This charming collection of custom notecards comes complete with matching white envelopes. Each card comes in a large 4 ¼ x 5 ½ size, which makes them practical to use as announcements, congratulations, or save-the-date cards. We proudly offer a 100% money-back guarantee if you are not completely satisfied with your purchase. Each card is proudly printed in the U.S.A. *** About Current ***Orin and Miriam Loo started Current from their home in Colorado Springs in 1950. What began as a mail-order fundraising campaign selling postcards to local ministers quickly expanded to include a full catalog of beautifully designed greeting cards, notecards, stationery, recipe cards, and other paper supplies. These cards are a testament to the fact that special touches don’t need to be expensive to be memorable!Today, Current Media Group LLC offers more than 2,000 products to millions of customers around the world. We’re committed to helping people keep in touch with their family and friends through unique, thoughtful, and affordable gifts and cards.
